title: Scenario-Based Teamwork Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Team Project Experience and Workplace Communication Skills
context.additional_context: Teamwork skill internalization through asynchronous peer discussions and case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can select and contextually apply three effective communication strategies in conflict situations
Learners can design actionable conflict resolution procedures for real projects after analyzing virtual team scenarios
Learners can develop and implement team role allocation plans based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
